overview:
Wolfgang has a vast amount of experience in software development, an instinctive know-how for finding novel technical solutions and has a strong research background in multimedia systems.

He worked as a research assistant at the University of Vienna from 2005 â€“ 2009. During that time he was able to prove, expand and deliver on his experience by participating in several international research projects. He received degrees in Economics and Computer Science from the Vienna University of Technology.

Within the Spectralmind team, he drives the development of our products and solutions by being responsible for their technical realization within the R&D team.
